description: Attempting to utter a word of the Dark Speech always ends in immediate death for a speaker who is not trained in its dark power. Fortunately, it is impossible to make someone use the Dark Speech if he or she is unwill- ing, because the languageÆs pronunciation is so exacting.
name: Normal
